kw.msg: ${q} = INSERT into public.users (name, email, password_hash, is_geek) values ('Matthew Wong', 'peter58@hotmail.com', 'abc123', false)

kw.name: Execute Sql String
kw.doc: Executes the sqlString as SQL commands. Useful to pass arguments to your sql. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.
kw.msg: Executing : Execute SQL String | INSERT into public.users (name, email, password_hash, is_geek) values ('Matthew Wong', 'peter58@hotmail.com', 'abc123', false)

kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current window or element and saves it to disk.
